PROJECT(FLTKVW)

SET(FLTKVW_SRCS
   Flv_List.cxx
   Flv_Style.cxx
   Flv_Table.cxx
   Flv_List.H
   Flv_Style.H
   Flv_Table.H
   MOOSFLTKUI.h
   FLTKCheckList.h)

INCLUDE(${MOOS_SOURCE_DIR}/MOOSFindFLTK.cmake)
#FIND_PACKAGE( FLTK REQUIRED )

IF(FLTK_FOUND)
  INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${FLTK_INCLUDE_DIR})
  ADD_LIBRARY(fltkvw ${FLTKVW_SRCS})
ELSE(FLTK_FOUND)
  MESSAGE("FLTKVW: FLTK not found. FLTKVW won't be built.")
ENDIF(FLTK_FOUND)
